definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

pinyin: A1 ka3 di2 ya4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: But learning in the classroom is only part of the world of education at Acadia .
sentences.chinese: 但是课堂上的学习只是在阿卡迪亚学习的一部分。

sentences.english: Acadia is the only national Park in the northeastern United States.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡迪亚公园是美国东北部仅有的一个国家公园。

sentences.english: Thunder Hole is a must-see in Maine's Acadia National Park.
sentences.chinese: 雷鸣洞是在缅因州的阿卡迪亚国家公园必须看的景点。

sentences.english: Mount Desert Island in Acadia National Park is one of the most famous.
sentences.chinese: 在阿卡迪亚国家公园的山脉荒岛是最著名的公园之一。

sentences.english: Acadians are descendants of Canada's original French-speaking population.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡迪亚人是加拿大的原法语人口的后裔。

sentences.english: If you're looking to fill out your life list, Acadia is the place to be.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想找个填写你的生活清单，阿卡迪亚的地方。

sentences.english: Sea and mountain meet at Acadia National Park in Maine.
sentences.chinese: 山与海在缅因州的阿卡迪亚国家公园交汇。

definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Augusta (place name: capital of Maine, city in Georgia etc)
Ithaca, Island state of Greece, the home of Odysseus 奧迪修斯|奥迪修斯/Ithaca NY, location of Cornell University 康奈爾|康奈尔
proletariat (loanword)/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4]
